author: mandrigin
content: Hey <@!144468805697929216> I have a question regarding Vouch, and post-merge "fee recipient" config. (basically, which execution-layer account gets fee tips). I know that Prysm is working on the implementation and it should be there soon, but what about if I use Vouch?

author: jgm
content: Vouch will have a couple of ways to set the fee recipient.  For individual stakers there will be a simple list in the `vouch.yml` file that allows you to specify fee recipient, either once for all validators or individually for each validator.  For service providers and similar there will be a method to fetch fee recipients from a remote endpoint, which will allow more dynamic fee recipient information.
